text: Minister John Amaratunge, and Deputy Ministers Ajith P. Perera and Harsha De Silva were also present on this occasion.President Maithripala Sirisena who is on a three-day State visit met the Opposition Leader of Australia Bill Shorten on 25th May at the Australian Parliamentary Complex. Minister John Amaratunge, and Deputy Ministers Ajith P. Perera and Harsha De Silva were also present on this occasion.
title: President meets Opposition Leader of Australia
